content.title: Carotid Artery Stenting Technique
content.definition: Endovascular technique for carotid artery stenosis treatment including access, embolic protection, angioplasty, and stent deployment.

concepts.definition: Vascular access for carotid stenting, typically via common femoral artery with selective catheterization of CCA.
Devices to capture or prevent distal embolization during carotid intervention.
Carotid stent selection based on lesion characteristics and deployment technique.
Management of bradycardia and hypotension from carotid body stimulation during CAS.

clinical_features.antiplatelet: Dual antiplatelet therapy minimum 30 days pre/post
